name: Sprigguns Blast!
text: If you control a "Sprigguns" monster: Choose 1 opponent's Main Monster Zone, or up to 2 instead if you control a Fusion Monster that lists "Fallen of Albaz" as material; if a face-up monster is in that zone(s), this turn, it cannot attack directly, also negate its effects. If no monster is in that zone(s), it cannot be used this turn. You can only activate 1 "Sprigguns Blast!" per turn.
